name: Capsule Hostel
address: 60 Ng  Huy n, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam, 111000
hotelDesc:
Conveniently located in Hanoi, Capsule Hostel is a great base from which to explore this vibrant city. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

Capsule Hostel also offers many facilities to enrich your stay in Hanoi. Top features of the hotel include free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, taxi service, ticket service.

The ambiance of Capsule Hostel is reflected in every guestroom. locker, mirror, towels, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary) are just some of the facilities that can be found throughout the property. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Whatever your purpose of visit, Capsule Hostel is an excellent choice for your stay in Hanoi.

rooms.name: Double Or Twin Room with Shower

places.name: Benh Vien Phu San Ha Noi
